channel.title: Downloads on The Community for Open Innovation and Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Downloads on The Community for Open Innovation and Collaboration

item.title: Previous Releases
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description:
The stand-alone Memory Analyzer is based on Eclipse RCP. It is useful if you do not want to install a full-fledged IDE on the system you are running the heap analysis.

To install the Memory Analyzer into an Eclipse IDE use the update site URL provided below. The Memory Analyzer (Chart) feature is optional. The chart feature requires the BIRT Chart Engine (Version 2.3.0 or greater).

Memory Analyzer 1.14.0 Release

  • Version: 1.14.0.20230315 | Date: 15 March 2023 | Type: Released
    • Update Site: https://download.eclipse.org/mat/1.14.0/update-site/
    • Archived Update Site: MemoryAnalyzer-1.14.0.202303151743.zip
    • Stand-alone Eclipse RCP Applications
      • Windows (x86_64)
      • Mac OSX (Mac/Cocoa/x86_64)
      • Mac OSX (Mac/Cocoa/AArch64)
      • Linux (x86_64/GTK+)
      • Linux (AArch64/GTK+)
      • Linux (PPC64le/GTK+)
    • New and Noteworthy: noteworthy.html

item.title: Snapshots
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description:
This page points to snapshots / preview versions of Memory Analyzer which haven’t been released.

Memory Analyzer Latest Stable Build

  • Version: Latest Development Build | Type: Development/Nightly Build
    • Update Site: https://download.eclipse.org/mat/snapshots/update-site/
    • Stand-alone Eclipse RCP
      • Windows (x86_64) (89.8 MB)
      • Mac OSX (Mac/Cocoa x86_64) (86.5 MB)
      • Mac OSX (Mac/Cocoa AArch64) (86.5 MB)
      • Linux (x86_64/GTK+) (86.5 MB)
      • Linux (PPC64LE/GTK+) (86.4 MB)
      • Linux (AArch64/GTK+) (86.4 MB)
